page.title: 13ST.MICHAEL'S CHURCH.
page.content: St Michael's Church is a modern church it's 21st birthday is on 29th September 1985,St Michael's Day.The vicar holds services on a Sunday,but not all Sundays are the same.Every Sunday there is Communion service at 9.00am.On the 1st Sunday of each month there is there is a Family service at 11.00am.On the 3rd Sunday there is a 'Songs of Praise' at 6.30pm. Activities in the church hall include, Brownies,Guides,Cubs,Mothers Union, Friends & Neighbours club & a Bingo & Social club. The bishop confirms about 10 people a year at the church.They also do holy baptisms & weddings.There is no choir. The font was presented in memory of 2 people,it is not connected to the floor.The altar was presented by Watermans Church.There have been 3 St Michaels'churches in Worcester.
